oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stability of molecular layer deposited zincone films: experimental and theoretical exploration
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHOUDHURY, D
RAJARAMAN, G
SARKAR, SK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: INORGANIC HYBRID MATERIALS
POLYMER THIN-FILMS
ETHYLENE-GLYCOL
GROWTH
FABRICATION
AL2O3
ZNO
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The degradation mechanism of MLD grown hybrid organic inorganic materials under ambient atmosphere is investigated with zincone as the material of study. Time dependent Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) spectroscopy is used to analyze the chemical changes in the material. Experimental findings are well supported by theoretical study using Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations.
